imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Create a landscape-cropped/letterboxed version of the uploaded graphic with centered emblem and text on a clean background (hero-guidance-logo.dim_1600x900.png).

existing_features.title: Update the selected element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/img[1]) in the Learn page hero so it displays the newly uploaded logo graphic instead of the current hero illustration.
Set the updated hero image alt text to clear English describing the uploaded logo graphic (do not include personal names).

projectName: Replace selected hero image with uploaded logo graphic
